trans-unit.source: Represents a control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> control along a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項，可讓使用者藉由移動選取的值範圍從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>沿著<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: A Slider control lets users select a value from a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 滑桿控制項可讓使用者從某個範圍的值中選取值。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a Slider control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示滑桿控制項的範例。

trans-unit.source: **Example of a Slider Control** ![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") You can customize a Slider control by setting its properties.
trans-unit.target: **滑桿控制項的範例**![滑桿圖例](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑桿圖例")可以設定滑桿控制項的自訂設定其屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes some of the attributes of a Slider that you can customize: - The orientation of the Slider, either horizontal or vertical.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單說明一些您可以自訂的滑桿的屬性:-滑桿，水平或垂直的方向。

trans-unit.source: - The tick mark locations along the Slider track.
trans-unit.target: -刻度標記位置沿著滑桿軌。

trans-unit.source: - The display of tooltips to show the current value of the Slider.
trans-unit.target: -顯示工具提示來顯示目前滑桿的值。

trans-unit.source: - The ability of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> to either snap to tick marks or to be positioned at any point along the Slider.
trans-unit.target: -能力<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>至任一個嵌入式管理單元至刻度，或在任何時間點沿著滑桿定位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: - The direction of increasing value along the Slider.
trans-unit.target: -增加的方向滑桿的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to customize a Slider control, see the individual member.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何自訂滑桿控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱個別成員。

trans-unit.source: Slider overrides the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: 滑桿會覆寫的中繼資料<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>屬性，並設定其預設值為 10。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the Slider is animated, the user may no longer be able to interact with the Slider control after the animation finishes.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果滑桿的值展示動畫，使用者可能不再是動畫完成之後，滑桿控制項和互動。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for options of how you can restore user control of a Slider after it is animated.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to︰ 設定屬性之後建立的動畫它使用分鏡腳本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)選項的方式還原使用者控制項的滑桿之後動畫。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Slider Control To apply the same property settings to multiple Slider controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 滑桿控制項以自訂適用於多個滑桿控制項，使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the Slider, see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於滑桿的狀態，請參閱[滑桿樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Slider control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在滑桿控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.target: 排列內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>並判斷其<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 計算<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> ，用來排列控制項。

trans-unit.target: 計算<xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a tooltip that contains the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> displays when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否包含目前的值的工具提示<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>時，會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: If a tooltip is displayed, this property also specifies the placement of the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示工具提示，這個屬性也會指定工具提示的位置。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement"></xref> values that determines where to display the tooltip with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>, or that specifies to not show a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement"></xref>值，決定要顯示相對於工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>，或指定不顯示工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement"></xref>, which specifies that a tooltip is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.AutoToolTipPlacement"> </xref>，指定不會顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.AutoToolTipPlacement*> dependency property.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of digits that are displayed to the right side of the decimal point for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> in a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定之小數點右邊所顯示的位數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>在工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must be a non-negative integer.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值必須為非負整數。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to a value other than a non-negative integer, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為非負整數以外的值，就會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The precision of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> that displays in the tooltip, specified as the number of digits that appear to the right of the decimal point.
trans-unit.target: 有效位數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>會顯示在工具提示中，指定為會出現在小數點右邊的位數。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 預設為零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: AutoToolTipPrecision is set to a value other than a non-negative integer.
trans-unit.target: AutoToolTipPrecision 會設為非負整數以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time in milliseconds that a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> waits, while it is pressed, before a command to move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> executes, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge*> command.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定時間量以毫秒為單位<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>等候，則按下時，要移動的命令之前<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>執行，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge*>命令。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge*>

trans-unit.source: This property is used when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> is included in the style for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.The default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> includes two invisible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that use the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and each end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>隨附於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>的樣式。<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>包含兩個不可見的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項之間的間距<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>的每一端</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>使用</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>的預設樣式</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>

trans-unit.source: When you press one of the invisible buttons, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> responds by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in that direction after the Delay property is applied.
trans-unit.target: 當您按下一個不可見的按鈕，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>回應移動<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>後延遲屬性會套用該方向中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>立即移至 發生於滑鼠指標停留在滑鼠點選位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>追蹤。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false` and a mouse click occurs along the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> away from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> moves in the direction of the mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為`false`並按一下滑鼠，就會發生沿著<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>遠離<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>按一下滑鼠的方向移動。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: Instead of moving immediately to the mouse click location, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> moves a distance that is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> property for each mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 而不需要立即到移動滑鼠按一下 [位置]<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>移動由定義距離<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A>按一下每個滑鼠的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The effect of multiple mouse clicks can be emulated by pressing and holding the left mouse button until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is repositioned to the desired location.
trans-unit.target: 多個滑鼠按鍵的效果，可模擬按住滑鼠左鍵，直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>重新放置到所需的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SelectionStart property cannot be less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property and cannot be greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: SelectionStart 屬性的值不能早於值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>屬性且不能大於值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A> property must also be greater than or equal to the value of the SelectionStart property.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A>屬性也必須是大於或等於 SelectionStart 屬性的值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.SelectionEnd%2A>

trans-unit.source: If SelectionStart is less than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> or greater than <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, SelectionStart is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SelectionStart 小於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>或大於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>，SelectionStart 設定的值為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>分別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A>屬性設定為值不是`null`，TickFrequency 屬性不使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Ticks%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tick marks are drawn at an interval that is specified by the TickFrequency property.
trans-unit.target: 繪製刻度標記的 TickFrequency 屬性所指定的間隔。

trans-unit.source: The tick marks start at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property and continue until the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property is reached.
